overview:
## Return Value

An initialized overlay renderer object.

## Discussion

Initially, the overlay renderer assumes that the overlay is fully opaque and that it has a content scale factor of 1.0. You can change these values as needed using the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKOverlayRenderer/alpha] and [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKOverlayRenderer/contentScaleFactor] properties.

# init(overlay:)

**Initializer**

Creates and returns the overlay renderer and associates it with the specified overlay object.

## Declaration

```swift
init(overlay: any MKOverlay)
```

## Parameters

- **overlay**: The overlay object to use when drawing the overlay content on the map. This object provides the data needed to draw the overlayâ€™s shape. The overlay renderer stores a strong reference to this object.

## Return Value

An initialized overlay renderer object.

## Discussion

Initially, the overlay renderer assumes that the overlay is fully opaque and that it has a content scale factor of 1.0. You can change these values as needed using the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKOverlayRenderer/alpha] and [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKOverlayRenderer/contentScaleFactor] properties.
